entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet CLI should return a list of target frameworks of the project or use target framework as a filter. #47093
  • [MSTest template] aka link for test runner doesn't seem to be correct #47092
  • [MSTest template] Test runner wording should be VSTest/Microsoft.Testing.Platform rather than VSTest/MSTest #47090
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 10.0.0-preview.2.25121.10, Running 'dotnet restore' failed with error MSB1025 #47089
  • [NETSDKE2E] SDK version not displayed in .NET 10 Preview 2 installer UI #47080
  • PGO Instrumented SDK fails to bind to CoreCLR on Windows #47079

Closed

  • dotnet workload restore failing in ADO pipeline #45931

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete workload-related things if the rest of the operation was unsuccessful #47110
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow disabling scenario-tests that don't work in the first build pass #47108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build tests on Linux and Windows #47106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify redist-installer and build installers in the VMR #47104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change MSTest Runner to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #47091
    untriaged, Area-Common templates

Merged

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit version #47053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test-tools feed to NuGet.config #47095
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable building sdk tests in the VMR #47103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in BundledTemplates #47098
    untriaged
  • Update .net10 p1 to p2 in the table #47054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts and enable caching #46796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2650510 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change property used for after-publish target #47068
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
